name: NetherRealm Studios
info:
谁收藏了NetherRealm Studios?

  • 夜明

    5月18天前
detail: NetherRealm Studios is an American video game developer based in Chicago, Illinois, founded in May 2010 to replace Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment's WB Games Chicago subsidiary. Led by video game industry veteran and Mortal Kombat co-creator Ed Boon, the studio is in charge of developing the Mortal Kombat and Injustice series of fighting games.

works.name: Injustice: Gods Among Us / 不义联盟：人间之神
